message: I hear... something.
I open my eyes to a dull pain in my skull.
Where am I...
...Ryuuhou's apartment. The same place I was before.
He moved me. I'm lying face down on a futon.
Paper lanterns flicker, casting shadows that dance on the walls.

name: 竜峰
message: "Are you awake?"
I try to look toward the voice, but my body won't move.
My arm and legs are numb, like they don't even belong to me.

I remember drinking tea in Ryuuhou's apartment...
He must have drugged it.
Fuck...

name: 竜峰
message: "Still can't move, right? I wouldn't force it if I were you. You'll just hurt yourself. You might even bite your tongue if you try to talk."
Ryuuhou's tone is gentler than before. It gives me the impression of a man preparing some kind of ritual. I have a very bad feeling about this.
I hear a sound like pieces of metal being struck against one another.
And there's this smell... like a mix of ink and antiseptic...

name: 蒼葉
message: "Wha... re you..."

name: 竜峰
message: "Better not to speak."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What are... you do..."

name: 竜峰
message: "Good question. Basically, I need your help with my research. I don't like calling it that, though. My art is my life."

name: 竜峰
message: "I want to see how my flower will grow on your back. How it'll bloom once it drinks that power of yours."
I feel him roll my shirt up, and then something cold against my back.
Is that Ryuuhou's hand? It's cold as ice.
Then, he holds a long, thin tool in front of my face.

name: 竜峰
message: "Look. This will pierce your skin and guide the ink deep into your flesh."

A brush?
...No.
Several fine needles protrude from the end.
That's going... into my skin?
I have to get out of here! But my body refuses to move.

name: 竜峰
message: "You'll only make it harder like that."
Ryuuhou's tone is chiding. He sounds genuinely concerned. I hear him stand.

name: 竜峰
message: "I need to get a few things. Be a good boy and lie still."
I hear the sound of footsteps on tatami followed by the opening and closing of a door.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Shit..."
